list_create_empty.tooltip: Create an empty array with specified type and length

list_create_with_values.tooltip: Create an array with initial values

list_values.tooltip: Array initial values list, right-click to add/remove items

list_values_simple.tooltip: Array initial values list, right-click to add/remove items

list_get.tooltip: Get value at specified index in array (0-based)

list_set.tooltip: Set value at specified index in array (0-based)

list_length.tooltip: Returns the length of the array

list_find.tooltip: Find index of value in array, returns -1 if not found

list_contains.tooltip: Check if array contains the specified value

list_min_max.tooltip: Get minimum, maximum, sum or average of array

list_sort.tooltip: Sort array in ascending or descending order

list_reverse.tooltip: Reverse the order of array elements

list_fill.tooltip: Set all elements of array to specified value

list_copy.tooltip: Copy contents of one array to another

list_foreach.message0: for each item %2 in array %1 do %3
list_foreach.tooltip: Iterate through each element in array and perform action

list_foreach_index.message0: for array %1 with index %2 value %3 do %4
list_foreach_index.tooltip: Iterate through array with both index and value

list2d_create.tooltip: Create a 2D array with specified rows and columns

list2d_create_with_values.tooltip: Create 2D array with initial values, each row represented by array value block

list2d_get.tooltip: Get value at specified position in 2D array (0-based index)

list2d_set.tooltip: Set value at specified position in 2D array (0-based index)

list2d_size.tooltip: Get rows or columns count of 2D array

list_shift.tooltip: Circularly shift array elements left or right by one position
